deepl-formality-select.error: The text could not be updated.
deepl-formality-select.name: Style

explanation.label: Explain
explanation.deepl:
## Text optimization

To make your question as readable and understandable as possible, we have it translated into German and back into English using the translation program [DeepL](https://www.deepl.com/translator).

The back translation is in almost all cases better than the original in terms of spelling, grammar, punctuation and language style. Back translation can be done in two ways: informally or formally.
explanation.spacy:
## Text analysis

Using NLP (Natural Language Processing) your question will be analyzed grammatically. The recognized nouns are put into their basic form, i.e. lemmatized, and suggested to you as keywords. For the text analysis we use the free NLP software [spaCy](https://spacy.io/). 

The keywords can be used to filter the list of questions or to create a word cloud.
explanation.topic-cloud:
## Topic cloud

The topic cloud visualizes the distribution of the keywords. These were determined by grammatical analysis of the nouns in the question text or explicitly assigned to the question by the author. 

 The calculation of the font size includes:

* the difference between up- and down-votes, if it is positive
* the number of questions with this keyword
* the number of questioners with this keyword.
* the role of the questioner: room creator, moderator or participant 
* whether the questioner has selected a question category
* whether the keyword was generated or assigned by the question poser
* whether the question was answered by the room creator or a moderator
* the controversy of the question  

 The topic cloud serves as a **navigator** to all questions related to a selected keyword: If you click on a word in the cloud, you will get to the questions related to this keyword. 

The room creator can customize the appearance of the topic cloud in the options according to his wishes. He can also experiment with the keyword generation parameters to optimize the **semantic selectivity**.
explanation.user-bonus:
The teacher can mark »good« questions for a bonus. Your questions from all courses (rooms) that have received a star will be listed here.

Depending on the agreement, you can email the token of the star to the teacher to redeem it for a bonus.
explanation.brainstorming:
## Lorem ipsum 

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Maxime mollitia,
molestiae quas vel sint commodi repudiandae consequuntur voluptatum laborum
numquam blanditiis harum quisquam eius sed odit fugiat iusto fuga praesentium
optio, eaque rerum! Provident similique accusantium nemo autem.

home-page.exactly-8: A key is a combination of 8 digits.
home-page.no-room-found: No session found with this key
home-page.only-numbers: A key is a combination of digits.

joyride.createQuestion: Call up the editor with the plus button. An AI will suggest keywords for your question. These will be used to create a topic cloud from all questions of the event.
joyride.voting: The audience can rate questions up or down, indicating their interest in answering a question or their agreement or disagreement with it. The rating difference is displayed.
joyride.commentFilter: There are numerous sorting and filtering options for the Q&A list. An active filter is shown in red. For better readability, the question stream can also be paused if it is very dynamic.
joyride.commentUserNumber: Click on the pin icon, and you will see all the questions of this user.
joyride.commentUserNumberTitle: Find all questions of a user

room-page.a11y-announcer: You are now in the session with the key you entered.
room-page.a11y-question_answer: Opens the page where you can ask questions and vote up or down other questions.
room-page.live-announcer: You're in the session now. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.

question-wall.intro-desc: Click on a question or navigate backwards and forwards with the arrow keys.

question-wall.autofocus-on-lbl: Turn on automatic focusing of new questions
question-wall.site-introduction-lbl: Open an introduction for this page

topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-countSelectedByQuestione: Number of times a keyword has been verified by a questioner
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-countKeywordByModerator-: Number of times this keyword has been used by moderators
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-countKeywordByCreator-in: Number of times this keyword has been used by the creator
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-countCommentsAnswered-in: Number of comments that have this keyword and have been answered
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-summedUpvotes-info: Number of all up votes made on the questions with this keyword
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-summedDownvotes-info: Number of all down votes made on the questions with this keyword
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-summedVotes-info: Sum of the up votes and down votes made on the questions with this keyword
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-cappedSummedVotes-info: (See the sum of all votes). The sum cannot fall below zero and becomes a minimum of 0
topic-cloud-dialog.keyword-scoring-controversy-info: Forms a score depending on the up votes and down votes.

topic-cloud-dialog.full-text: From the full text of the questions

user-bonus-token.no-bonus: You haven't received a bonus star for a »good« question yet.
user-bonus-token.mail-subject: Request to redeem my tokens from the »frag.jetzt« session »{{sessionName}}«
user-bonus-token.mail-body1:
Hello,

I have received the following tokens in the »frag.jetzt« session »{{sessionName}}« with the key code »{{sessionId}}«:
user-bonus-token.mail-body2:
I ask for the redemption in bonus points.

Thanks for »frag.jetzt«!

---
user-bonus-token.redeem-clipboard-success: All required data for the mail to event management was copied to the clipboard.
user-bonus-token.redeem-clipboard-failure: The data could not be saved to the clipboard.
user-bonus-token.redeem-mail-failure: Your mail app could not be accessed. Copy the data to the clipboard and use it to create a mail to the event management.
